name: ConsumableWithActiveCountOf10Achievement
description: Accumulate at least 10 usages of a single consumable.

name: MultipleProjectileAchievement
description: Installed quintuple projectiles and quintuple radial projectiles.

name: EnlargeProjShrinkShipAchievement
description: Got your projectiles 2x bigger and your spacecraft 2x smaller.

name: SkinPerksAchievement
description: Coated some iron in your skin, then electrified it.

name: HealerAchievement
description: Had Joy, Capitalist Consumerist, Salty Elixir and Cloverleaf installed at the same time.

name: Killed0EnemiesInLevelAchievement
description: Completed a level without any casualties.

name: CompleteAllMissionsAchievement
description: Completed all missions in a run.

name: CartdridgeHoarderAchievement
description: Stocked up 20 cartridges without using them

name: UsedAllSoftwareAchievement
description: Used all softwares at least once.

name: UsedAllConsumablesAchievement
description: Used all consumables at least once.

name: AllGoldBadgesInAllSpacecraftsAchievement
description: Obtained all badges in all spacecrafts.

name: BronzeMirrorBossDefeatedAchievement
displayName: Magic Bronze mirror, on the wall
description: Proved that you are the strongest of them all.

name: SilverMirrorBossDefeatedAchievement
description: Proved that you are the strongest of them all, 3 times

name: GoldMirrorBossDefeatedAchievement
displayName: Magic Golden mirror, on the wall
description: Proved that you are the strongest of them all, 5 times.
